mapper.select: SELECT e.member_num, e.education_school, s.school_name as schoolName, e.eduhigh_id, h.eduhigh_name as eduhighName, e.education_major, e.major_detail, e.education_verification as educationVerification FROM education e left join edu_high h on e.eduhigh_id = h.eduhigh_id left join school s on e.education_school = s.school_id WHERE e.member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_name = #{memberName}, member_jumin = #{memberJumin}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_postcode = #{memberPostcode}, member_address = #{memberAddress} WHERE member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO education (member_num, education_school, education_major, major_detail) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{educationSchool}, #{educationMajor}, #{majorDetail})
INSERT INTO job_history (member_num, jh_department, work_content, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{jhDepartment}, #{workContent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
